entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: N 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing overnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
